EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-Email-SBC for E Nurture-T001ZO.Email 5 Consideration
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect communications on your private LTE network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Use Case
Explore high-quality communications – without compromise Your private LTE network investment is a critical component of your operations, and voice over LTE (VoLTE) provides mission critical voice and video communications services to your employees and contractors. But unless you protect and manage the IP-based communication streams that cross your network boundaries, your business is at risk. And who wants that?
To get full value from your private VoLTE network, you need a Session Border Controller (SBC) that can protect your network from external threats and enable the high-quality communications your business needs to succeed. Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Digital Networks Marketing, Nokia © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
